posts.title: Overview
posts.text: This is a term project for subject: Artificial intelligence, Sejong University.Based on Twitter data, This AI classification apprehends a sentiment of input sentence and recommends emoji.You can see this repository‚Äôs code: https://github.com/sejongresearch/EmojiRecommendMy team completed this project, but we plan to update this project continuously. 1. File Structure Diagram 2. Requirements(I‚Äôll made requirement.txt later‚Ä¶) bash1pip install -r requirements.txt 3. Getting Startedbash123git clone https://github.com/sejongresearch/EmojiRecommend.gitcd EmojiRecommendpython server.py After that, Connect to http://localhost:5000 or http://127.0.0.1:5000 4. Q&AIf you want to ask question about this project,Please contact us through this repository‚Äôs issue.The comment is also okay, but I think it‚Äôs better to leave issue because many people will come to the issue more. :-) 6.
